critique: The document is an amendment to an executive order regarding the payment of expenses incurred in connection with the death of certain civilian officers and employees of the United States. It specifies the costs of preparation of remains allowable under section 2 of these regulations shall include costs of embalming, cremation, necessary clothing, and casket and the total amount allowed for such preparation shall not exceed $150. The document does not express any sentiment on the axes. Therefore, all scores are 0.
